name: Mina Protocol (httpz) 🪶
fullText:
The Mina Stack is coming to life 🧬

@ZekoLabs just launched the Zeko Bridge (alpha) — their final major engineering milestone before mainnet.

It’s another step toward high-performance, verifiable applications built on Mina.

Watch our chat with the team 👇 https://t.co/pBaxWT5EOm

name: Mr.RC｜𝟎𝐱𝐔 Ⓜ️Ⓜ️T
fullText:
对的， @MyHongKongDoll 赚到钱的第一件事都是去学习

某些人居然想着辍学炒币，或者说什么学历不重要

1 - 你们赚了HKDoll那么多钱吗？

2 - 你们学历真的高吗？

“我打宿傩，真的假的？”
